revised_title: Chemical Analysis of Chinese Wax and the Discovery of Alcohol of Cerotic Acid
tldr: The author investigates the chemical nature of Chinese wax, which resembles spermaceti and beeswax. They discover that it is likely an insect secretion and analyze its composition, leading to the discovery of the alcohol of cerotic acid. The author also explores the chemical reactions and properties of the wax, including its distillation and decomposition.
